hero.headline: San Mateo's Sharpest Cuts, Grooviest Vibes
hero.subheadline: Get a fresh look and a unique experience at Around the Edge Barbershop. Walk-ins welcome!

about.title: About Around the Edge Barbershop
about.description: Around the Edge Barbershop isn't just a place for a haircut; it's a San Mateo institution. We've been dedicated to providing precision cuts and exceptional service to the Bay Area for years, building lasting relationships with our clients and becoming a cornerstone of the community. Our experienced barbers stay ahead of the curve with the latest trends and techniques, ensuring you always leave looking and feeling your best.
features: Detailed Consultations: We take the time to understand your individual style and preferences.
Classic and Modern Styles: From traditional fades to contemporary looks, we've got you covered.
Premium Products: We use only the highest quality grooming products to nourish your hair and scalp.
Clean and Comfortable Environment: Relax and enjoy the experience in our meticulously maintained shop.
Convenient Online Booking: Schedule your appointment with ease.
Family-Friendly Atmosphere: We welcome clients of all ages.

images.alt: Professional service consultation showing team expertise
Modern tools and equipment used for quality work
Professional team working on client project

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional solutions tailored to your needs

items.title: Precision Haircuts
items.description: Experience a haircut tailored perfectly to your individual style. Our skilled barbers provide expert cuts, ensuring you leave feeling fresh and confident.
items.alt: Image of a barber giving a client a precise haircut with clippers.

items.title: Expert Hair Braiding
items.description: From simple braids to intricate designs, our braiding services offer a unique and stylish look. Alfredo's expertise ensures precision and creativity in every braid.
items.alt: Image showcasing intricate and stylish hair braids.

items.title: Classic Hot Towel Shaves
items.description: Indulge in a traditional hot towel shave for a smooth and refreshing experience. Our classic shaves include pre-shave oil, hot towels, and a soothing aftershave balm.
items.alt: Image of a barber giving a client a classic hot towel shave with a straight razor.

items.title: Grooming Packages
items.description: Combine multiple services for a complete grooming experience. Our packages can include a haircut, shave, and beard trim, leaving you looking and feeling your best.
items.alt: Image of a man looking well-groomed after receiving a haircut and beard trim.

businessBenefits.title: Why Choose Around the Edge Barbershop?

items.title: Expert Hair Braiding Services
items.description: Beyond standard cuts, Alfredo specializes in intricate hair braiding styles. Whether you're looking for cornrows, box braids, or a custom design, you'll receive a professional braiding service tailored to your hair type and desired look.

items.title: Convenient Appointment Scheduling & Walk-Ins
items.description: We understand your time is valuable. That's why we offer both appointment scheduling and welcome walk-ins. Appointments are recommended to guarantee your spot, but we always strive to accommodate walk-in clients whenever possible. Book online or simply stop by!

items.title: Wheelchair Accessibility for All Clients
items.description: Around the Edge Barbershop is committed to providing a comfortable and accessible experience for everyone. Our shop features a wheelchair accessible entrance, parking lot, and restroom, ensuring a seamless visit for clients with mobility needs.

items.title: Kid-Friendly Atmosphere
items.description: Bring the whole family! We pride ourselves on creating a welcoming and fun environment for kids. Our barbers are experienced in providing haircuts for children of all ages, ensuring a stress-free experience for both parents and kids.

items.title: Multiple Payment Options for Your Convenience
items.description: We accept a variety of payment methods to make your visit as easy as possible. Pay with debit cards or utilize NFC mobile payments for a quick and seamless transaction. We aim to provide flexibility and convenience in every aspect of your experience.

items.title: Free Parking & Easy Access
items.description: Located in San Mateo, we offer the convenience of free street parking right outside our shop. This means you can easily find a spot and enjoy your haircut without the hassle of paid parking or long walks. We also have on-site parking available.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our satisfied clients have to say about our professional services.

items.reviewText: 5-Star Review for Around the Edge Barbershop I recently had the pleasure of visiting Around the Edge Barbershop, and I can honestly say it was one of the best barbering experiences I’ve ever had.

I’ve been a regular at Around the Edge Barbershop for a while now, and I couldn’t be happier with the service! From the moment you walk in, you’re greeted by a welcoming atmosphere and a professional...
I recently visited Around the Edge Barbershop in San Mateo, and I couldn’t be more impressed! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was welcoming, and the staff were friendly and professional.
If you’re looking for a great barber in San Mateo, look no further than Alfredo at Around the Edge Barbershop! I’ve been coming to him for a while now, and he never disappoints.
